attributes.additional_details:
Is our system failing us?
Just in the last week a girl was smashed to the ground because "she looked" at the man in the wrong way and also an 11 yr old girl was raped on the way home from school after being followed in broad daylight.
The time is right to re-introduce the Death Penalty as our current law enforcement is not working.
We need to re-introduce the death penalty for specific crimes to clear the streets of violent criminals and the current "softly, softly" approach plainly isn't working.
Our society is broken, we must mend it before its irreversibly damaged.
